meanings.definition: Resembling a stem in appearance or structure.
meanings.sent1: The plant had a stemlike shape, thin and elongated.
meanings.sent2: The stemlike branches swayed gently in the breeze.
meanings.sent3: The stemlike design of the building made it look like a giant flower.
meanings.sent4: Her hair cascaded down her back in a stemlike fashion.
meanings.sent5: The stemlike silhouette of the tree against the sunset was breathtaking.

meanings.definition: Having the characteristics of a stem.
meanings.sent1: The stemlike structure provided support for the delicate flower.
meanings.sent2: The stemlike texture of the material was smooth and sturdy.
meanings.sent3: The stemlike handle of the umbrella made it easy to hold.
meanings.sent4: His voice had a stemlike quality, strong and unwavering.
meanings.sent5: The stemlike strength of the bridge ensured its durability.

meanings.definition: In the shape or form of a stem.
meanings.sent1: The stemlike pattern on the fabric resembled vines climbing up a wall.
meanings.sent2: The stemlike outline of the leaf was clearly visible under the microscope.
meanings.sent3: The stemlike appearance of the sculpture gave it a modern twist.
meanings.sent4: Her dress had a stemlike design, with thin lines running down the fabric.
meanings.sent5: The stemlike structure of the tower made it stand out against the skyline.
